clinical_study.brief_title: Three Year Evaluation of a Cohort of Patients Presenting Osteoporotic Fractures
clinical_study.official_title: Three Year Evaluation of a Cohort of Patients Presenting Osteoporotic Fractures

brief_summary.textblock:
A specialized osteoporosis clinic has existed in our hospital since 2010. The descriptive retrospective analysis of patients included in this pathway was the subject of a first study on patients included between January 2010 and January 2011 and reported to the Congress of the French Society of Rheumatology (SFR) in December 2011, then a second study on patients included between January 2012 and December 2016, presented as an e-poster at the SFR Congress in December 2017 and in a poster at the American Society of Bone and Mineral Research Conference (ASBMR) in October 2018 and published in 2019 in Archives of Osteoporosis.
The effectiveness specialized osteoporosis clinics is the subject of numerous publications.
It therefore seems important to evaluate the effectiveness of our management, 3 years from the date of inclusion of patients in the osteoporosis clinic of our hospital.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of fractures since the enrollment in the clinic
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment of patients between january 2012 and december 2015 to the interview date
primary_outcome.description: Number of incident fractures suffered by the patient since their enrollment in the osteoporosis clinic.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of bone mineral density since the enrollment in the clinic
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment of patients between january 2012 and december 2015 to the interview date
secondary_outcome.description: Evolution of the bone mineral density since their enrollment in the osteoporosis clinic

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment of patients between january 2012 and december 2015 to the interview date
secondary_outcome.description: Level of satisfaction measured with a four level Lickert scale ( Very satisfied ? Satisfied? Unsatisfied? Dissatisfied?)

intervention.description: Structured, directive, telephone interview, in order to collect the outcome measures in addition to the patients electronic health record.

study_pop.textblock: All patients who were enrolled in the cohort of the osteoporosis clinic of our hospital between january 2012 and December 2015 following an osteoporotic fracture.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients who had an osteoporotic fracture followed by the osteoporosis clinic since between January 2012 and December 2015
- Acceptation of the telephone interview
Exclusion Criteria:
- Age < 18 years
- No social security coverage
